name: Aeegle
tagline: Google Apps and Cloud computing experts
description:
Aeegle is a global service and consulting firm for Cloud computing, specialized in Google Apps and Cloud development.
Since 2009, Aeegle has specialized in delivering cloud-based business solutions and consulting based on cloud computing, specifically Google Apps. We implement and maintains Google Apps for businesses and organizations worldwide.
Google Implementation Services
- Google Apps Setup and consulting - Google Apps Support - Google Apps Administration - Google Apps Training - Email migration to Google Apps - Google Apps Engine Development - Google Gadgets Development - Google Apps Scripts Development - Google Sites Development - Google Apps Marketplace Applications. - Custom developed solutions to enhance and extend Google Apps - Integration of Google Apps with Salesforce or other applications - Extension of functionality through Google APIs - Ongoing support and administration
READ MORE...
